Title: Wake Up, Girls! Deai no Kiroku: A Brief Recording
Description: ['Special animation disc sold to advance ticket buyers of a ', Wake Up, Girls!, ' preview event at Akihabara UDX. It contains audition footage of the main characters of the series that is not included in the movie.']
Characters: ['Shimada, Mayu', 'Okamoto, Miyu', 'Katayama, Minami', 'Nanase, Yoshino', 'Kikuma, Kaya', 'Hisami, Nanami', 'Hayashida, Airi', 'Tange, Junko', 'Matsuda, Kouhei']
Voices: ['Yoshioka, Mayu', 'Takagi, Miyu', 'Tanaka, Minami', 'Aoyama, Yoshino', 'Okuno, Kaya', 'Yamashita, Nanami', 'Eino, Airi', 'Hidaka, Noriko', 'Asanuma, Shintaro']
Staff: [['Yamazaki, Yuuta', 'Episode Director, Storyboard'], ['Yamamoto, Yutaka', 'Script'], ['Chikaoka, Sunao', 'Chief Animation Director']]
